title: New patch crashes
body: Every single time i load a game after champ select i get a bugsplat and crash. this has been ongoing since the new patch.  I have windows ten, my directX is updated, my nvidia 1080 is current.  I have run through the tech support suggestions and have even reinstalled.  I would like tomplay leauge.  I have run it on this machine as recent as a few days ago.  please help

replies.body: Just to ensure I'm not providing steps you have already gone through, can you provide the name of the troubleshooting guide you've already run through?
